participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: curious and adventurous, always eager to explore new cultures and flavors.
participant_1.background: i visit europe twice a year. i'm an art major in college. i love to cook paella. i have a weakness for fish and chips. i'm a descendant of christopher columbus.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: imaginative and resilient, finding joy in the strange and extraordinary aspects of life.
participant_2.background: since the surgery i've had strange powers. i can move objects with my mind. i had to have a transplant. i'm a boy. i was born with my heart outside my body.
